community.leaf.textchain.adventure.ChainConstructor

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ChainConstructor<C>
    ChainSource.getChainConstructor()
    Generates a standard chain constructor by supplying all other dependencies the specific chain type requires.
    protected abstract ChainConstructor<C>
    Chain.getConstructor()
    Gets this chain's constructor so more chains of the same type can be created and operated on.
    protected ChainConstructor<LegacyTextChain>

    Methods in community.leaf.textchain.adventure with parameters of type ChainConstructor
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static <C extends Chain<C>>
    C
    TextChain.chain​(ChainConstructor<C> constructor)
    Constructs a new chain by supplying the constructor with a new, empty text component builder.
    static <C extends Chain<C>>
    C
    TextChain.chain​(ChainConstructor<C> constructor, ComponentLike componentLike)
    Constructs a new chain by deriving a new text component builder from the provided component-like and supplying it to the constructor.
    static <C extends Chain<C>>
    C
    TextChain.chain​(ChainConstructor<C> constructor, Style style)
    Constructs a new chain by applying the provided style to a new text component builder and supplying it to the constructor.
    static <C extends Chain<C>>
    C
    TextChain.chain​(ChainConstructor<C> constructor, TextComponent.Builder builder)
    Constructs a new chain by wrapping the provided text component builder and supplying it to the constructor.
    static <C extends Chain<C>>
    C
    TextChain.reset​(ChainConstructor<C> constructor)
    Constructs a new chain by supplying the constructor with a new, explicitly-unformatted text component builder (thus "resetting" its style).
    static <C extends Chain<C>>
    C
    TextChain.reset​(ChainConstructor<C> constructor, @NullOr TextColor color)
    Constructs a new chain by supplying the constructor with a new, explicitly-unformatted text component builder (thus "resetting" its style) with the specified color applied.
